mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date FROM tbl_tv_show WHERE PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( #{date} , '%Y%m' ) , date_format( m_date, '%Y%m' ) ) = -#{addMonth} and have_show = 1
select DATE_FORMAT(m_date,'%Y-%m-%d') m_date,audio,pk_global_id from tbl_tv_show where m_date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select DATE_FORMAT(m_date,'%Y-%m-%d') mDate,audio,pk_global_id from tbl_tv_show where have_show=1 order by m_date desc LIMIT 1

select (PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(m_date, '%Y%m'), date_format(#{date}, '%Y%m') )) offset from tbl_tv_show where ((PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(#{date}, '%Y%m'), date_format(m_date, '%Y%m') )) + #{oldOffset}) >= 0 and have_show = 1 order by offset desc limit 1

select (PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(m_date, '%Y%m'), date_format(#{date}, '%Y%m') )) offset from tbl_tv_show where ((PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(m_date, '%Y%m'), date_format(#{date}, '%Y%m') )) - #{oldOffset}) >= 0 and have_show = 1 order by offset asc limit 1
mapper.update: update tbl_tv_show set have_show = 1 where m_date <= #{date}
